bibl.title: Letter from William Osler to Mabel H. Lazear, December 31, 1901

div1.p: Osler writes that he will help secure Mabel Lazear's pension.

div1.head: Letter from William Osler to Mabel H. Lazear, December 31, 1901

opener.dateline:
1 WEST FRANKLIN ST. Baltimore, Md.
Dec. 31st, 1901.

div1.p:
I have writtrn to Senator McComas, and we will do anything that is
possible to get the bill through. I will also write to Gen. Wood and see if he could
not use his influence with President Roosevelt.
